sect1.title: Usage
sect1.para: Computes the inverse error function for each element of x. The erf function takes only a single argument y = erfinv(x) where x is either a float or double array. The output vector y is the same size (and type) as x. For values outside the interval [-1, 1] function returns NaN.

sect1.title: Example
sect1.para: Here is a plot of the erf function over the range [-.9,.9].
which results in the following plot. erfinv1
